mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Animal (desertionNo, filename,happenDt, kind, breed, colorCd,age, weight, processState, sexCd, neuterYn,specialMark,careNm) VALUES (#{desertionNo},#{filename}, #{happenDt}, #{kind}, #{breed}, #{colorCd}, #{age}, #{weight}, #{processState}, #{sexCd},#{neuterYn},#{specialMark},#{careNm})
INSERT INTO ADOPT (adoptidx, aniid, userid, adoptdate) VALUES (adopt_idx.nextval,#{aniid},#{userid},#{adoptdate})
